overview: Camel Live in Concert Recorded at The Catalyst, Santa Cruz, California - 2010 Featuring: Lady Fantasy, Unevensong, Hymn to her, Echoes, Stationary Traveller, Drafted, Rhayader, Rhayader goes to town, Lunar Sea, Another night, Ice, Spirit of the water, Slow yourself down, Mother road, and For Today
title: Camel: The Opening Farewell
